name: GGANG!
description:
'GGANG' is a virtual reality arcade baseball game. You can play games alone with an AI pitcher, or you can play games with two players on a single device. Enjoy baseball together by being a batter and the other a pitcher!


Game Features

1. Local multiplayer mode
With one VR device, two players can enjoy the game together. Player wearing vr devices can be hitter and other player can be pitcher, so have a baseball game together!

2. Shouting & Shaking System
Does the ball keep missing? Does the throwing ball keep hitting the bat? Shout on the VR device, or shake the controller! The special function is activated when the gauge is fully raised. Look for a reversal by using powerful hits and faster pitches!

3. Variable strike zone
The size of the strike zone automatically changes to match the height of the player wearing the VR device. Everyone enjoy GGANG!



Game mode

1. vs CPU
An AI pitcher throws a random ball in a random location for 60 seconds. Get the best score!

2. vs Player
Divide two vive controllers into two players. Players who don't wear VR HMD throw balls at the monitor, and players who wear hit the flying ball. The pitcher and the batter, let's have a showdown!
